name: Electronic Supremacy (SacrebleuCollective)
description:
In Electronic Supremacy, you are an intelligent vacuum robot that wants to destroy every other electronics in the house to insure his superiority. 

This is a stealth game where you must pass as a normal vacuum robot in front of the human and a ninja machine destroying electronics behind his back.

This game has been developed in our free time in a month.

Want to see more ? Support us on Patreon (https://www.patreon.com/sacrebleucollective)

Controls (Keyboard or Gamepad)

- Button A / Space : Switch Mode

- Button X / E : Interact /Drop carried item

- Left Joystick / WASD : Move

Credits: 

  • William Homs: Design / Code
  • Audrey Laurent-André: Design / Code
  • Marc D'Amico: Art / VFX
  • Mathieu Martinet: Art
  • Walter Homs: Sound Design / Music
  • Garrick Handley: Animation
  • Sijia Mao: Code
